metadata.name: Death Awaits Us All...
metadata.description:
üòú‚úåÔ∏èü§üü§ò. Life is too short, painful, and full of suffering.  It is up to us to change that.  It's easy, all you have to do is be kind to eachother, and stop judging one another.  Nobody is better than anyone else. ‚ÄúEveryone you will ever meet knows something you don't.‚Äù - Bill Nye The Science Guy

3840x4800 pixels, drawn on my phone.  Time-lapse available on my instagram/tiktok.
